meanings.definition: Inclined to chat or talk a lot.
meanings.sent1: She is the chattiest girl in our class, always sharing stories.
meanings.sent2: The chattiest parrot in the pet store never stops talking.
meanings.sent3: The chattiest squirrel in the park chattered away happily.
meanings.sent4: Her chattiest mood was like a bubbling stream of words.
meanings.sent5: The chattiest bee buzzed from flower to flower, spreading news.

meanings.sent1: He is the chattiest person at the office, always knowing the latest news.
meanings.sent2: The chattiest group of friends always had the juiciest gossip.
meanings.sent3: The chattiest cat in the neighborhood knew all the secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her chattiest behavior was like a spreading wildfire of rumors.
meanings.sent5: The chattiest river flowed with tales from distant lands.
